definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to pile up/to heap up/a mass/pile/heap/stack/large amount

pinyin: fan3 ying4 dui1 ran2 liao4 yuan2 jian4
qi4 leng3 shi4 fan3 ying4 dui1

sentences.english: I - (3) - to think what has happened to the nuclear reactor.
sentences.chinese: 我一想到那个核反应堆所发生过的事情就担心不已。

sentences.english: Soviet Reactors can be overcharged, but will cause it to take damage.
sentences.chinese: 苏联的反应堆可过量充电，但会受损。

sentences.english: The chain reaction that actually runs the reactor can be shut off in a matter of seconds.
sentences.chinese: 实际运行反应堆的链式反应可以在数秒左右被关闭。

sentences.english: Nuclear reactors are net positive in terms of supporting the grid.
sentences.chinese: 在支持输电网方面，核反应堆是正极。

sentences.english: During this period, the company expects to bring the water temperature in the reactors fully under control.
sentences.chinese: 这段时间，公司将完全控制反应堆的水温。

sentences.english: Three of the reactors were already shut down for regular inspections at the time of the quake.
sentences.chinese: 其中三个反应堆已经在地震时的定期检查中关闭。

sentences.english: Chief engineer of reactor control supervises the reactor.
sentences.chinese: 反应堆控制总工程师监督反应堆。

sentences.english: Chief engineer of reactor control supervises the reactor.
sentences.chinese: 反应堆控制总工程师监督反应堆。

sentences.english: It has also destroyed the cooling tower at its reactor at Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 北韩还炸毁了宁边核反应堆的冷却塔。

sentences.english: This is a graphic of a typical reactor.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个典型的反应堆的图解。

sentences.english: Development of research on protective zircaloy claddings in nuclear reactor was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了核反应堆中锆合金防护型包壳的研究进展。

sentences.english: Inside the reactor the large molecules are cracked into smaller molecules.
sentences.chinese: 在反应堆内部大的分子被裂解为较小的分子。

sentences.english: And this is a challenge of reactor design.
sentences.chinese: 这是对反应堆设计的一个挑战。

sentences.english: Reported smoke coming from the 3 after the reactor has stopped smoking.
sentences.chinese: 报道称，此前冒出白烟的3号反应堆已经停止冒烟。

sentences.english: We made parts under contract for use in your nuclear subs powerplant.
sentences.chinese: 根据合同，我们制造你们国家核潜艇反应堆的组件。

sentences.english: China said it will continue with plans to build about twenty-five new nuclear reactors.
sentences.chinese: 中国表示将继续与计划兴建约二五新的核反应堆。
